    "number": 232896,
    "data": "1,3,5,8,12,18,27,41,63,98,154,244,389,623,1001,1612,2600,4198,6783,10965,17731,28678,46390,75048,121417,196443,317837,514256,832068,1346298,2178339,3524609,5702919,9227498,14930386,24157852,39088205,63246023,102334193",
    "name": "a(n) = 3*a(n-1) - 2*a(n-2) - a(n-3) + a(n-4), where a(1) = 1, a(2) = 3, a(3) = 5, a(4) = 8.",
    "comment": [
        "Conjecture:  a(n) is gives the position of 2*n-1, for n >= 1, in the sequence S = A232895 of positive integers generated by these rules:  1 and 2 are in S; if x is in S then x + 2 and 2*x are in S, where duplicates are deleted as they occur."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Clark Kimberling, <a href=\"/A232896/b232896.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000</a>",
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec#order_04\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (3,-2,-1,1)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = 3*a(n-1) - 2*a(n-2) - a(n-3) + a(n-4), where a(1) = 1, a(2) = 3, a(3) = 5, a(4) = 8.",
        "a(n) = n-1 + A000045(n+1). - _Tom Edgar_, Mar 09 2015",
        "G.f.: x*(1-2*x^2)/((1-x)^2*(1-x-x^2)). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 18 2015",
        "a(n) = -1 + (2^(-1-n)*(-(1-sqrt(5))^(1+n) + (1+sqrt(5))^(1+n))) / sqrt(5) + n. - _Colin Barker_, Mar 11 2017"
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(5) = 3*a(4) - 2*a(3) - a(4) + a(5) = 3*8 - 2*5 - 3 + 1 = 12."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "a[1] = 1; a[2] = 3; a[3] = 5; a[4] = 8; a[n_] := a[n] = 3*a[n - 1] - 2*a[n - 2] - a[n - 3] + a[n - 4]; t = Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}]",
        "CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 2 x^2) / ((1 - x)^2 (1 - x - x^2)), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 18 2015 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) I:=[1,3,5,8]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 3*Self(n-1)-2*Self(n-2)-Self(n-3)+Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 18 2015",
        "(PARI) Vec(x*(1-2*x^2)/((1-x)^2*(1-x-x^2)) + O(x^50)) \\\\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 18 2015"
    ],

        "Cf. A232895."
